name: Thomas Barth
bio: I'm a computer science student at the University of Bergen with a strong passion for programming and software development. With a solid foundation in languages like C/C++, Rust, Java, Python, and Haskell, I'm eager to apply my skills in real-world projects and collaborate with like-minded individuals.

relevant_experience_history.experiences: Improving production systems, software development, analysis, solution design, and testing with technologies like Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs, Jenkins, Bitbucket, and React JS.
Assisting students in 'Introduction to Programming' and 'Advanced Programming' courses, planning and executing group sessions, and researching teaching styles.

other.description: Non-profit student organization dedicated to developing and managing IT systems for clients.
Golf group of Bergen Student Sports Club (BSI) at the University of Bergen.
